amendatorysection.catchline: State-certified seeds; certification agencies; nonprofit basis.
amendatorysection.para: Certification work, whether conducted by the University of Nebraska Institute of Agriculture and Natural Resources or by any agency designated by it, shall be on a self-supporting basis and not for financial profit. The institute may designate as the agency for the certification of seed potatoes a nonstock, nonprofit cooperative association engaged in the marketing of such potatoes under exclusive marketing agreements with its growers.
